website_summaries.verdict: If you are a fan of the brand-new creatures seen in Pokémon Sword and Shield, you’ll love the variety of strong Pokémon cards found in this booster box.
pros: Over 200 cards to collect in this set
Contains 36 booster packs with 10 cards each
Find powerful Pokémon cards like Dhelmise V, Lapras V Max, and Wobbuffet V
cons: With 200 cards in the set, and 360 cards per booster box, expect to get some duplicates

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVERRRR!!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome booster box great pulls!! Buying again REALLLLL soon to finish my master set ❤️❤️❤️ Bought again two weeks later and had GREAT pulls!! Also finish with my master!! set
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Scammed
customer_reviews.text: Scammed. 6 of these same "ultra rares" from the same box. Statistically impossible with how card lots are built unless there was tampering, pack-weighing, etc. involved. The outer wrap on the "factory seal" was also shriveled and looked like it was probably resealed. Considering disputing but I'm aware how hard it is to prove this sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy little boy!
customer_reviews.text: The kiddo got 7 v cpokemon cards and one Vmaxx! As well as many holographic cards. It was a random surprise and took us about an hour to open. SO FUN! Make sure you read the reviews from the specific seller like I did to avoid getting scammed. I ordered from MVP market place seller! Very happy! Will order more from them in the future
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B

customer_reviews.title: Packs were opened
customer_reviews.text: Packs were already opened, took out the rares and switched them out for commons
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I had one disappointed 9 year old who opened the box only to find that every pack had been cut open and cards had been replaced. How awful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Snidarich

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Came in 3 days earlier than expected, nothing much to say as it is what it is, a booster box of 36 packs of the new Pokemon set
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from MVP marketplace
customer_reviews.text: This was suppose to be a unopened booster pack all 36 packs had the bottoms cut open and cards replaced. Do not and I repeat do not buy from the MVP marketplace its a scam.
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: Great pulls for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: In this booster box alone I managed to get 6 V cards, a Lapras VMAX, a secret rare Ordinary Rod, AND a hyper rainbow rare Snorlax VMAX! Definitely worth it and a great addition to my expanding collection!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Fraud!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids just "opened" packs in which every single pack had only energy cards on Easter morning. The packs had been opened on the bottom, cards taken out and replaced with energy cards in every single pack. No online cards in the packs everything had been taken out and scammed. I will be fighting this to the absolute top as my kids are sitting here on Easter morning saying they just wanted to get some Pokemon cards in their packs.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, nice collection tho!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased through amazon and got an amazon from amazon. Shipped from excell Missing cards from boxes
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Some great pulls!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun too open especially when you get good pulls! My daughter loves opening the packs with me and we are currently working on completing a master set!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Bracero

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and sold by Amazon. Came in original sealed packaging. Not tampered with. Got 8 V cards and 1 Vmax. Lots of holos. Defenatly a boost to my collection. Hopefully some better pulls next time around.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: This package was worth all the money I spent on it it has everything as promised mine had almost ever pack with a gx ex or v and the shipping said it was supposed to arrive 2 weeks after I purchased it and it came 6 days early. If you are looking for good quality and love Pokémon cards I strongly recommend this box for you.
customer_reviews.author: Codyf704

customer_reviews.title: YES! Got 2 Secret Rares AND a Rainbow!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading some comments. But got mine, and it was unopened. Went through all packs, and landed the Zacian V Secret Rare, Marnie Rainbow, Ordinary Rod Secret Rare, and several V’s. I can’t believe it. My son is going to go nuts too. Not sure why I can’t share photos.
customer_reviews.author: Eli H

customer_reviews.title: Product was as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: My son watches all sorts of YouTubers with Pokemon cards. He had the idea of opening up the pack and recording them just like some of his favorite people online. The joy on his face, as he pulled out some Shiny, Holo, Revers Holo and Rainbow cards, was more than enough for this dad. Excellent for a card opening party or even 1 pack at a time for completing their weekly chores.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Eaton

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY, LEGIT PACKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY cautious ordering Pokemon cards online, especially Amazon, due to many times of getting resealed packs. I sifted a long time while keeping an eye on these. I finally read enough reviews and talked myself into taking the gamble once again AND I AM SO HAPPY I DID. $105 FOR AN ENTIRE BOX OF LEGIT SWORD/SHIELD BOOSTERS!!!!!!!! I am buying another box as I type this
customer_reviews.author: Collin Nioi

customer_reviews.title: Some duplicates but clearly not tampered with.
customer_reviews.text: I did get some duplicate cards(definitely more than I’d like), but what can you expect from 36 packs? I carefully chose which seller to buy from and ended up buying from The Gaming Brokers. The package was nice and secure and the product was untouched. Nothing was resealed and no cards were replaced. I’ve added some pictures of the duplicates and also the best cards that I obtained to prove that nothing was stolen or replaced. I would add more pictures of the other rare regular cards that I got but that would take up too much desk room. With that, be careful which seller to buy from and happy collecting!
customer_reviews.author: M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Unlucky or scammed...plus damaged box.
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged upon arrival. I initially was worried that box damage ruined cards however after I pulled no valuable cards from the entire box I then felt scammed. I bought this same product from a different retailer 2 weeks ago and pulled 2 hyper rare cards, one rainbow and one gold trainer. This box had four V cards which are okay pulls but I know I should’ve had more across the entire 36 card box. V cards were the best in this box. Maybe just unlucky but typical pull rates are 2-3 ultra/hyper rares per box minimum...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hornbeak

customer_reviews.title: Grandson was thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. My grandson knows his way around these websites and he selected this. All I can say is that it kept him occupied for many hours over several weeks during Covid isolation. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Gotta catch them all
customer_reviews.text: Its pokemon cards. However I did get pretty good pulls.
customer_reviews.author: FlooffyFluff

customer_reviews.title: 36 Packs to boost your collection
customer_reviews.text: Contains 36 booster packs for the Sword and Shield expansion to the Pokemon TCG. You get an online card with each pack that lets you unlock a digital booster pack with the Pokemon TCG Online game, too. Overall, a great haul.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Happy Despite Some Packaging Damage
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping it has more to do with the Amazon driver rather than knowing a company would give them damaged packaging to deliver.. luckily as poorly damaged the box was in, only like 4 cards out of allll the card packs got bent at the corner. But luckily those cards were not holographic or rare so we were relieved. Everything else was fine so we would be willing to buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Li Na

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Birthday gifts for my grandson and he said they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Shishuwah

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Just opened over half the box 19 packs and one bent v card, I’ve had many booster boxes with bad pull ratios before but never this bad, and the bent card while the rest of pack was flat has me a bit concerned. Buyers beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great box for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great box for a great price. Came when it said it would and was in great condition
customer_reviews.author: C.Sowards

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive loosely shrimped wrapped. Packs all sealed properly. I ordered 2 cases, opened one thus far. 6’a and 2 Vmaxes. (One full art, 1 gold) Tons of other great cards.
customer_reviews.author: The Man, Myth & Legend

customer_reviews.title: Really regret
customer_reviews.text: The pull rate is way better from just about every other source... I figured spending more would equal more good pulls, but this was not the case. We were super disappointed, and will probably never buy another box. I hope you have better luck than we did !
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jones

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This box is really good and was worth the price I appreciate that this is not a scam but not only that, what I got was amazing (full art cramorant v and normal , secret rare snorlax VMAX and normal lapras v full art sableye v full art , zacian v , snorlax v secret rare metal saucer as well
customer_reviews.author: Kiyana Grayer

customer_reviews.title: Good pulls/ Seal was torn though..
customer_reviews.text: Trust worthy vendor in terms of rare pulls. The package arrived with the pokemon sealed plastic broken and opened. With that I decided to rate 4/5 instead of 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Sam Berry

customer_reviews.title: shady!
customer_reviews.text: Someone repackaged all the cards and took every valuable card out and repacked with doubles. All the bottoms of packs were cut open?
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy 123

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get very many pulls but that’s the set itself I believe. The box, packs, shipping, everything else was perfect. No issues!
customer_reviews.author: tha.trippie.hippie

customer_reviews.title: Is this legit?
customer_reviews.text: I had 9 ultra rare pulls which never happens to me. It was wrapped in the Pokemon wrapping so it looked legit. But I did not pull a rainbow rare or even a full art? Is that normal? Cause usually I pull at least 1 full art. Please let me know cause I want to buy another one but want to make sure this was legit and not tampered
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied with pulls
customer_reviews.text: Hmm, not impressed with the cards I pulled. Not enough rare cards. Very suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great pulls!
customer_reviews.text: Got 6 great pulls from the booster box. Great cards. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Majin Buu

customer_reviews.title: Good pulls
customer_reviews.text: Bought the booster box so I could have a pack to open each day during the stay at home order I still have a few packs left to open but so far I’ve pulled a hyper rare stonjourner Vmax, full art Marnie, snorlax VMax. I’ve also pulled 3 regular v cards and a bunch of holo rares.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of 3rd party sellers
customer_reviews.text: Be wary of third party sellers. The packs within my box were definitely tampered with. The online code cards did not match the cards within the individual booster packs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: Very damaged box and cards
customer_reviews.text: The condition of the box was very disappointing. The box was very smashed in and ripped open in some spots. The cards were bent because of it. I overall was not happy. My wifes birthday is today and I had to present her with a terrible looking box and messed up cards because I didn’t have time to have another one sent.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Chartier

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 12 year old birthday gift and it was the biggest hit of the day and continues to be so !
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves them. Wrapping in tact, not damaged. Arrived ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: vsedlacek

customer_reviews.title: Box review
customer_reviews.text: Came in excellent condition. Box was still sealed and unopened. Managed to pull a Cramorant V, Morpeko V full art, Sableye V, Lapras V, Keldeo V, Wobbuffet V, and a Torkoal V all in one booster box!!
customer_reviews.author: sourattana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for so many packs. And super quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: itspieflavor

customer_reviews.title: Dishonesty does not deserve stars but 0 stars was not an option
customer_reviews.text: Booster Box was sealed. Every booster pack inside the box had the bottom cleanly cut off! Box was advertised as NEW. There was no way to tell the packs were open until you pulled a pack out and the cards went flying! Each pack was also repacked. The value cards were taken out and replaced with junk cards. Extremely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legit Booster Box
customer_reviews.text: Pokémon did great on this box, 9 pulls plus 7 holos!! I’ve never seen that many hits in one box!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bare

customer_reviews.title: Good Pulls
customer_reviews.text: My son got some good pulls out of this box, and the packaging was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Great box.
customer_reviews.text: I got 5 v cards. I got 2 full arts. I got 1 secret rare gold trainer. And 1 hyper rare trainer. This is a great box. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever made.
customer_reviews.text: I just love how many rare cards that you can get with this big box of Pokemon card packs. I would highly recommend if you are a big Pokemon card collector like me. Definitely worth the $100.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: received my booster box. To my surprise it came opened with all card in the packs replaced with energy.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Much the same as other boosters
customer_reviews.text: Pre-release orders should've been an indication of demand. The product is OK. Looks exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Morne Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying Huge scam
customer_reviews.text: It was terrible every pack had a cut in the bottom and was filled with energy’s I was so mad
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Treloar

customer_reviews.title: Sold and shipped by amazon
customer_reviews.text: Ordered thought amazon sold and shipped by amazon. Factory sealed and great pills. 4 full arts sr, 2 vs and on raindow sr card. Nice
customer_reviews.author: ian c

customer_reviews.title: Good, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome package official pokemon wrapping! All packs were good nothing looked tampered with. I'm happy. I got a basic zacianV and most of the other V's and vmax Snorlax. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Came as expected. A good deal for a collector.
customer_reviews.text: As a booster pack, I'd recommend this if you're someone who collects by set. You'll definitely get most if not all the commons and uncommons, and only be missing a few rares.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this straight from amazon thinking I would not get any good pulls but I was proven wrong curvyluv sent me the box definitely should bye I got 3 full sets one of 5 v cards and 7 hollow rares amazing
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Factory sealed as Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Came in great shape, factory sealed. Got 2 full foil cards and a handful of V rares. will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !!All sealed.  Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: Great authentic Pokémon cards. Super happy with the variety and special cards we got !!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Purchased directly from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product and I am very happy with my purchase. I pulled 8 full arts and 6 holos. I purchased mine directly from Amazon and it arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great cards!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Pokémon cards for my grandsons 7th birthday, they were a big hit, he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in perfect condition. Sent in a box, so all packages were in good shape Had some good pulls as show in picture Ordered from allied goods
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: 5 for 5!!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and I got exactly what was described, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: nick mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Pulls
customer_reviews.text: I got great pulls 6 v cards one full art v one v max!
customer_reviews.author: TL Tony

customer_reviews.title: It was not good
customer_reviews.text: I don't know because we ordered the sword and shield booster box and it gave me a evaluations booster box and the bad thing was I was all fake cards.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s legit
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how it’s cheaper than the Pokémon center (when I bought it) but it’s legit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Value in packs to price of box.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: Got a $40 card and some other good ones would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Brink

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We got 1 VMAX and 7 V cards. We are very happy with this purchase!!!! Good luck everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stonjourner

customer_reviews.title: Opened
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these boxes and got three packs that appear to be HOT GLUED closed
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Got here earlier than expected! Awesome pulls! Will buy again 😁
customer_reviews.author: Aristeia818

customer_reviews.title: Scam: Arrived with all packs sliced open
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived with all of the packs sliced open at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Me an my kids were very happy great pulls
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product they were night 3 packaged in any way and was delivered in a cool Marvel Avengers box. I plan on ordering a box of weed and then only will order from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

product_meta.title: Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield Booster Box, Multicolor, Model:172-81651
product_meta.description: Welcome to the Galar region with the Pokemon TCG: Sword & Shield expansion! Meet more than a dozen powerful Pokemon V, including the Legendary Zacian and Zamatenta. Some Pokemon V, like Stonjourner and Snorlax, can evolve into enormous Pokemon VMAX for even more power! You'll also find first partners Grookey, Scorbunny, and Sobble, little cuties like Wooloo and Yamper, and familiar Pokemon in their new Galarian forms. Catch up with a new generation in the Pokemon TCG: Sword & Shield Expansion! The Pokemon Sword & Shield expansion includes: Over 200 cards, Dozens of newly discovered Pokemon from the Galar region, More than 15 powerful Pokemon V and 4 enormous Pokemon VMAX, More than 25 Trainer cards and a new Special Energy card.
feature_bullets: GIVE YOUR COLLECTION A BOOST: Includes 36 Sword & Shield booster packs containing 10 cards each to advance your collection to a new level.
YOUR BEST ODDS FOR RARE CARDS: This booster box is factory sealed to prevent packs from being weighed or mapped. No more fear of valuable insert cards being removed.
BECOME THE GREATEST TRAINER: Will you find Stonjourner VMAX, Snorlax VMAX, or Lapras VMAX?
GOTTA CATCH THEM ALL: The Pokemon Sword & Shield expansion brings over 200 brand new cards to collect. Will you find them all?
BRAND NEW CARDS: Sealed by Pokemon International

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars404 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
